text: Ra jaba tiniharuko eka samuhale yasto bhan'yoh ki ‘‘timi yasta manisaharula'i kina upadesa dinchau, jasala'i allaha nasta garnevala cha, va jasala'i kathora yatana dinevala cha?’’ Unale bhaneh ‘‘timro palanakarta samaksa aphula'i niraparadha sid'dha garnuko nimti, ra yasakarana ki kadacita yiniharu dara manun.’’
